hero.headline: About Panorama NY, Inc
hero.subline: One mission: to be the most trusted brokerage partner in Orange County, NY.

blocks.body: Panorama NY, Inc was built around a simple principle: clients deserve clear advice, local expertise, and consistent support for one of life's most important financial decisions.
Our team supports buyers, sellers, investors, and relocating families across Orange County, NY, with practical strategy and personalized service at every step.

items.name: Client-First Always
items.description: Every decision starts with one question: what's best for our client?

items.name: Deep Local Roots
items.description: We live here. We know every street, school, and market dynamic.

items.name: Honest Advice
items.description: We tell you the truth about pricing and strategy, even when it's not what you want to hear.

principalBroker.headline: Meet the Leadership Team
principalBroker.title: Brokerage Leadership
principalBroker.bio: Panorama NY leadership is focused on creating a brokerage experience built on trust, accountability, and long-term client relationships. We combine neighborhood-level knowledge with disciplined strategy to help clients make confident decisions.

community.headline: Community Involvement
community.body: Orange County, NY is home for our team, and serving this community is part of our mission. Panorama NY, Inc supports local initiatives, partnerships, and practical education that helps residents navigate real estate with confidence.

items.quote: I came from a franchise where I was a number. At Pinnacle, I have a real broker who answers the phone, a team that collaborates, and the freedom to build my business my way.
items.name: Marcus Johnson

items.quote: Jane's mentorship in my first two years was worth more than any training program I could have paid for. This is where I'll build my entire career.
